headline.0: Marriage Showdown: Texas v. Supreme Court
headline.1: Marriage Showdown: Texas v. Supreme Court
headline.2: The Decline of the United States

short_description.0: Texas is setting itself up for a showdown with the Supreme Court. A bill to defy the court's rulings died in the House last week, but anti-gay politicians could find a sneaky way to revive it. Meanwhile, the Attorney General of Texas refuses to say if he'll obey the Supreme Court's ruling in June.

short_description.2: America has tried, and continues to try, to push President Putin and Russia out of a competitive role in world politics. But Russian counter moves can move America out of its position of world leader.
